headline: Why Palantir Stock Is Skyrocketing Today
summary: Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR) stock is seeing massive gains in Wednesday's trading.  Palantir stock is surging today after President Donald Trump announced a 90-day pause on reciprocal tariffs for all countries except China.  Despite volatility in the broader market, Palantir's share price is now up 21.5% across 2025's trading.

headline: Is Palantir (PLTR) Expanding Its Client Base or Cashing In on Loyal Spenders?
summary: Palantir Technologies’ (PLTR) sales are rising fast. The company’s Q4 2024 revenue surged 36% year-over-year, reaching $828 million. But what’s driving the jump? Is the software company expanding its client base or are current ones just spending more? Let’s dive into some figures from Main Street Data to know what’s fueling the growth. PLTR stock has soared from under $20 at the start of 2024 to over $100 in 2025. The stock gained over 230% in the past 12 months, fueled by AI hype and strong Q4

headline: Why Trump’s Tariff Downpour Can Catalyze Palantir Stock (PLTR)
summary: In a market reeling from President Trump’s sweeping tariffs, Palantir Technologies (PLTR) stands out as a rare beacon of resilience. Last week’s stock market plunge is on track to be extended this week, with Asian markets following their Western counterparts. However, not all stocks are made the same. Unlike most tech giants battered due to concerns over supply chain disruptions and trade war fears in general, Palantir’s software-driven business model is immune to these headwinds. Better yet, th

headline: Best AI Stock to Buy Now: Nvidia vs. Palantir Technologies
summary: Shares of Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) and Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) have fallen sharply during the recent market rout.  Among the 67 analysts who follow Nvidia, the median target price is $175 per share.  Among the 27 analysts who follow Palantir, the median target price is $96 per share.
